title: Champ select trolls.
body:
When you queue for ranked, and someone on your team decides to disco nunu, is abusive, and promises they'll run it down mid, what exactly am I supposed to do?

I dodged, maybe not the best decision for the community, but I wasn't about to try to put up with that for 15min. Now I have a dilemma. I lost 3lp and have dodge timer, and I want to report them but I don't have that option.

Thoughts?
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

replies.body:
i had to dodge my game 2 times in a row(like 5min before i type this) bcoz of this same shit, i  lose 3LP then 10LP penalty 5min then 30min but this trash company will punish people who dodge and not those who troll


i am so happy they are losing players hope i leave some day to, so sick of this trash company

i dont understand
will you write in the report "he picked nunu" ?

i agree with you that he deserves a perma ban for that, but i think riot will disagree

I got a dude on my FL, plays nunu, but hes a beast. 
Not a run down mid and feed beast, a "ima 1 hit yo carries, fitemebro" kinda beast.
do you need a sarcasm sign mate? xD
